name: AirGrid
slogan: Powering privacy first advertising on the open web
description:
AirGrid is building the next generation of artificial intelligence technology to help keep the web running. We are all used to a free internet with a diverse set of services and content, but without a sustainable way for creators to monetise their work we will be left with only a few portals, run by large corporations.

Our first step in a better internet is to build an analytics platform which connects marketers to publishers, to ensure investment in great content creators continues - whilst allowing both parties to grow efficiencies in their business.

team.name: Dennis Yurkevich
team.bioHtml: Founder @AirGrid • Powering privacy first advertising on the open web.

team.title: Founder
team.name: Dennis Yurkevich
team.bioHtml: Founder @AirGrid • Powering privacy first advertising on the open web.

jobs.title: JavaScript Engineer
jobs.description:
About the Role

At AirGrid we are not concerned with using the latest buzzwords in our marketing materials, our aim is to drive true value for our clients. The platform is deeply technical in nature, and much of the work is based around cutting edge research to which we actively contribute. If you are passionate about internet scale datasets, complex network structures, simulations, machine learning and a pure user experience - then we want to hear from you.

About AirGrid

We are at day one! We have a clear vision, a tested problem statement and funding from a selection of industry heavyweights. If you are the sort of person who loves a challenge and wants to drive true change, whilst building a positive company culture you will enjoy working here.

Requirements
- You can build most things you can imagine.
- You are comfortable with most technology stacks.
- You keep things simple.
- You have a good product sense.

Highly Desirable
- Love of UX.
- Open source contributions.

Benefits & Perks

- Make an immediate impact. You will be working on the core product.
- Work on the bleeding edge. We are always happy to try the latest ideas and novel approaches to make our product stand apart. 
- Work directly with the founder.
- Get unprecedented level of product ownership. 
- Opportunity to quickly progress.
- Flexible work schedule.
- Generous stock options.
- Education budget.

jobs.title: Senior Data Scientist
jobs.description:
About the Role

At AirGrid we are not concerned with using the latest buzzwords in our marketing materials, our aim is to drive true value for our clients. The platform is deeply technical in nature, and much of the work is based around cutting edge research to which we actively contribute. If you are passionate about internet scale datasets, complex network structures, simulations and machine learning, then you are also a weirdo like us.

About AirGrid

We are at day one! We have a clear vision, a tested problem statement and funding from a selection of industry heavyweights. If you are the sort of person who loves a challenge and wants to drive true change, whilst building a positive company culture you will enjoy working here.

Requirements

- 2+ Years in a data science role, preferably in a start up.
- Solid Python experience, with a love for clean code.
- Experience with analytical packages such as Numpy, SciPy.
- Experience with SQL.
- Previous work on an end to end analytical research project, this can be as part of study.

Highly Desirable

- Basic grasp of javascript, and Tensorflow.
- Interest in privacy preserving ML.
- Previous experience with working with web events data.
- Understanding of privacy preserving techniques.
- Kaggle projects, blogs, research or github repos (please share!)

Benefits & Perks

- Make an immediate impact. You will be working on the core product, not generating random reports for other teams.
- Work on the bleeding edge. We are always happy to try the latest ideas and novel approaches to make our product stand apart.
- Work and report directly to the founder.
- Get unprecedented level of product ownership.
- Opportunity to quickly progress.
- Generous stock options
- Education budget

jobs.title: Software Engineer - Node, JS, Python
jobs.description:
AirGrid... what is that?

A platform for privacy preserving machine learning on the web, pioneering a new approach to distributed AI running on edge devices. The internet is changing to a more private & secure place, in which companies own less data collected from web users. We are building for this new future, with the core tenant of the platform helping to preserve the privacy of individuals whilst allowing the advance of AI & ML based products & services.

So, what will you do as an Engineer at AirGrid?

- You'll build new product features from start to finish: through conception, research, maintenance, and polish.
- You'll build improvements to performance, reliability, and product polish.
- You'll design services, pipelines and features.

This might be for you if...

- You can readily learn most technologies as you go. To you, technologies are about tools and tradeoffs, not an ideology.
- You care about the business implications of anything you build. You're not just going after cool stuff — you understand the balance between craft, speed, and the bottom line.
- You've spent meaningful time as a senior engineer or tech lead — or even better, you've managed a team before.
- Bonus: You're fluent with Javascript, NodeJS, Python, Docker, GCP.
- Bonus: You're familiar with the basic of ML and care about the privacy of people online.

We would offer you:

- Make an immediate impact. 
- Work on the bleeding edge. We are always happy to try the latest ideas and novel approaches to make our product stand apart. 
- Work directly with the founder.
- Get unprecedented level of ownership. 
- Opportunity to quickly progress.
- Generous stock options.
- Education budget.
- Flexible working once settled in!
- Office in central London with free stuff to eat and drink.

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer (contract)
jobs.description:
Hi!

We are looking for a contract UX/UI designer to join our team on an ongoing but part time basis.

We are a small team building a privacy preserving ML platform for the web.

Please take a look at https://airgrid.io for more details on the product.

This is a remote role, but we are accepting applications from Europe.

To apply please submit: 
- a link to a B2B web app you have designed and are most proud of! 
- your hourly rate
- available start date

Thanks and stay safe!
